pages.title: Mutton Chops!
pages.text: Ranching for $(#FFA500)Mutton Chops $()is simple! This is the 4th capability that you will unlock! $(br2)Animal Ranched: Sheep$(br)Item Given: Mutton Chops$(br)Tool Required: Butchering Knife

pages.name: Capability Level 0
pages.text: At $(#FFA500)level 0$(), you will be able to immediately gather $(#FFA500)Mutton Chops$()
